The article in question shares a true st: 2. Nigeria has a social investment programme to help the poor and handed out cash and food during the lockdown, but not to all citizens.
The Nigerian government had instituted a: SIP) in partnership with the World Bank, which provides low-interest loans to small businesses, offers jobs and training to unemployed people, and gives cash handouts to the poor and vulnerable.
